description: Complete test plan for user registration with all scenarios including success, validation errors, and duplicate checks

tests.title: Successful Registration with Valid Data
tests.description: User can register with valid full name, email, and password

tests.title: Registration Fails with Empty Full Name
tests.description: Registration should fail when full name is empty

tests.title: Registration Fails with Invalid Email Format
tests.description: Registration should fail when email format is invalid

tests.title: Registration Fails with Short Password
tests.description: Registration should fail when password is less than 8 characters

tests.title: Registration Fails with Password Mismatch
tests.description: Registration should fail when password and confirm password don't match

tests.title: Registration Fails with Duplicate Email
tests.description: Registration should fail when email is already registered

tests.title: Registration Validates Email Format Strictly
tests.description: Registration should reject various invalid email formats

tests.title: Registration Trims Whitespace from Inputs
tests.description: Registration should trim leading and trailing whitespace from inputs

tests.title: Registration Converts Email to Lowercase
tests.description: Registration should normalize email to lowercase

tests.title: Registration Creates User with Timestamp
tests.description: Registration should create user with createdAt and updatedAt timestamps
